html.intro:
This form demonstrates a conditional fork in the user journey.

Try leaving all optional fields blank and continuing. Then come back and enter 007 in the first telephone field before continuing. The latter action will take you on a slightly different journey.

tel.label: Phone number
tel.tooLong: Enter a telephone number in 20 characters or less

telOther.label: Other number
telOther.tooLong: Enter a telephone number in 20 characters or less
